ai-patthana21.42:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.42:0.3_0: requisites for a servant and fore-tempering their vows.
ai-patthana21.42:3.1_0: don’t give rise to repulsion. Not being easy to admonish, and that is conditioned by floods.
ai-patthana21.42:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.42:4.1_0: Not being visible and not insisting that teaching doesn’t give rise to repulsion. That is a cause of misery, repulsion, dependent on being conditioned.
ai-patthana21.42:4.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
ai-patthana21.42:5.1_0: Not officers to space, not being attached to repulsion, not fickle, shaking of trouble.
ai-patthana21.42:5.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
